com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan

Class ReconciliationStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.DefaultObservable
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.ReconciliationStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable, Element, Step

    public class ReconciliationStep
extends DefaultObservable
implements Step
    Step that implements Reconciliation between the Mesos Master and a framework. The Step will be complete when it receives status for all known tasks and then performs implicit reconciliation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.Step

        Step.InvalidStepException

      • start

        public java.util.Optional<PodInstanceRequirement> start()
        Description copied from interface: Step
        Starts the Step, whose Status should be Status.PENDING. Returns an OfferRequirement, or an empty Optional if obtaining/updating resource requirements are not applicable to the Step. This will continue to be called for as long as Element.isPending() returns true.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Step
        See Also:
        #updateOfferStatus(Collection)} which returns the outcome of the {@link OfferRequirement}

      • updateOfferStatus

        public void updateOfferStatus(java.util.Collection<Protos.Offer.Operation> operations)
        Description copied from interface: Step
        Notifies the Step whether the PodInstanceRequirement previously returned by Step.start() has been successfully accepted/fulfilled. The operations param is empty when no offers matching the requirement previously returned by #clone() could be found. This is only called if {@link #getOfferRequirement()} returned a non-{@code null} {@link OfferRequirement}.
        Specified by:
        updateOfferStatus in interface Step
